version_description: Bug fixes.
This update includes bug fixes. Because the app is newly launched, our team is closely monitoring all bugs and crashes. Please bear with us. We're at full speed fixing them through out the week.

- Reduced memory consumption so that it works smoother on the phone with less memory related crashes.
- Resolved multiple reported bugs and issues on editing video timeline as well as other crashes.
- Next up: we're working on most advanced color adjustments in the editing screen. Stay tuned.

- More stability improvements and bug fixes in the video editing mode.
- For Polarr Photo Editor fans, we're adding more advanced video editing options for filters, color and light adjustments similar to Polarr over the next few weeks. Stay tuned!
- Added 2.35:1 ratio for recording.

• More stability improvements and bug fixes throughout the app
• For Polarr Photo Editor fans, we're adding more advanced video editing options to 24FPS in the coming weeks! Look forward to editing options for filters, color adjustments, and light adjustments similar to Polarr over the next few weeks. Stay tuned!

Email us, support@polarr.co, if you find any new bugs or need help with anything! Include the hashtag #24FPS and tag @Polarrist in your videos so we can see what you're creating!

• New: 24FPS now supports video adjustment in exposure, temperature, tint, HSL, saturation, vibrance, highlights, shadows, whites, blacks, and vignette!
• Fixed: Playback issues with Apple Music.

Email us, support@polarr.co, with any feedback or bugs you find. Don’t forget to tag us in your 24FPS videos on Instagram (@polarr).

• New: 24FPS now supports video adjustment with curves!
• New: Change the start time of any song you select and more music improvements.

We would love to hear from you! Email us, support@polarr.co, with any feedback or bugs you find. Don’t forget to tag us in your 24FPS videos on Instagram (@polarr).

You can put away your universal translator. 24FPS is going global with this update!

• New: 24FPS now supports your language
• New: New month, new LUTs! Open the app to see the three latest movie packs we added.
• Fixed: Miscellaneous bug fixes

We would love to hear from you! Email us, support@polarr.co, with any feedback or bugs you find. Don’t forget to tag us in your 24FPS videos on Instagram (@polarr).

• Fixed: Various bug have squashed in this release

Missed reading the update for 1.1.2? We added support for a ton of languages and added 3 new LUT packs in that update. Check it out!

We would love to hear from you! Email us, support@polarr.co, with any feedback or bugs you find. Don’t forget to tag us in your 24FPS videos on Instagram (@polarr).

We've revamped the timeline. Splitting is better. Trimming is better. Everything about it is better. Update and explore the new timeline while editing your videos in 24FPS. We've also added a retime button so you can change the speed of clips. And of course, tons of bug fixes for you, because you deserve the best. 

• New: Revamped timeline 
• New: Retime button to speed up or slow down time
• Fixed: Polarr filter importing fixes
• Fixed: Polarr filter performance improvement
• Fixed: Exporting improvements

Now go out and create! Tag us (@polarr) in any content you post to Instagram. Feedback or bugs? Then send an email to support@polarr.co.

It's a new month, so you get some new movie packs! Grab this update and see what's new :)

• New: Another month means three new movie packs. Your hints for which movies are next:1 red balloon, space pit, and a kitty mobile. 
• Fixed: Old Polarr filters would crash the app on import. That does not happen anymore.
• Fixed: You can now drag and drop timeline bubbles. 
• Fixed: When you trim the player, it now previews where you're trimming. 
• Fixed: Drag and drop has a placeholder effect so you can understand where you'll place the clip. 

Now go out and create! Tag us (@polarr) in any content you post to Instagram. Feedback or bugs? Then send an email to support@polarr.co.

This update brings a redesign to the editing panel. You can now tap any clip to see the available adjustments for it. All your favorite tools are still there. These changes make the editing panel flow faster.
• New: The app is now primed and ready for iOS 13.
• New: Tap a clip to see the available adjustments.
• Fixed: This bug, that bug, all the bugs.

Now go out and create! Tag us (@polarr) in any content you post to Instagram. Feedback or bugs? Then send an email to support@polarr.co.

New month, new update. Update the app to get the latest movie LUTs and improvements to the editor. 

• New: All your unfiltered videos save automatically now, so never lose your recording again!
• New: Filter strength slider for more control with LUTs
• New: 4 new movie packs for members to celebrate this spooky month
• New: Tap a filter in the filter panel to unselect it
• Enhanced: We improved timeline navigation with various UI and UX fixes to make it easier than ever to use
• Fixed: Various bug fixes

Now go out and create! Tag us (@polarr) in any content you post to Instagram. Feedback or bugs? Then send an email to support@polarr.co.

Here's a little update for you that fixes some bugs! 

• New: Full-screen recording for iPhone X and up
• Fixed: A bug that resulted in exported videos being choppy
• Fixed: Stretching issues on iPads
• Fixed: Various bug fixes

Now go out and create! Tag us (@polarr) in any content you post to Instagram. Feedback or bugs? Then send an email to support@polarr.co.

You deserve nothing but the biggest and best, which is why this update makes the app bigger and better than ever. Update to find the ability to import nearly everything, the power to edit photos, and so much more. 

• New: Import photos, GIFs, and Live Photos. You can import pretty much anything, but mostly the things we literally just mentioned. 
• New: Edit photos. You can now edit photos with your favorite LUTs and make adjustments. 
• New: Light mode. Everyone else is introducing dark mode, but we did that first. So we give you light to balance things out.  
• New: More color! Our UI has a splash of paint throughout. 
• New: LUT packs for November. Members go find out what’s new! 
• Fixed: Be gone bugs; go away! 

Feedback or bugs? Then send an email to support@polarr.co.

• New: Edit photos. You can now edit photos with your favorite LUTs and make adjustments. 
• New: Light mode. Everyone else is introducing dark mode, but we did that first. So we give you light to balance things out.  
• New: More color! Our UI has a splash of paint throughout.

• Fixed: Be gone bugs; go away! 

Feedback or bugs? Then send an email to support@polarr.co.

• Fixed: Various exporter bugs
